name: deep-thoughts
description: This project sets up an application where users can create an account, share thoughts, and comment on other thoughts.  The project is built using the MERN stack - MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
